sub_topic: Identifying the isomorphism between two graphs.
message_1:
Given the two graphs shown below, determine whether they are isomorphic or not. If they are isomorphic, provide an isomorphism between the two graphs.

Graph 1:

```
    A---B
   / \ /
  C---D
```

Graph 2:

```
    1---2
   / \ /
  3---4
```
message_2:
The two graphs are isomorphic. An isomorphism between the two graphs can be established by mapping the vertices of Graph 1 to the vertices of Graph 2 as follows:

A -> 1
B -> 2
C -> 3
D -> 4

This mapping preserves the adjacency between the vertices in both graphs.
